# Bi-Archetypal Analysis <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" alt="" width="120" />


Bi-archetypal analysis computes the archetypes of a dataset in much the same way that bi-clustering does.

This package contain all necessary functions to perform the bi-archetypal analysis succesfully. But for now only
multivariate datasets are supported.

## Installation

Install the latest version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require("devtools")) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("aleix11alcacer/biaa")
```
